definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有全新的洗衣机，浴缸，跑步机和电视机。

sentences.english: I bought a small machine, in order to enable them to exercise their own.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一个小的跑步机，为了让他们熬炼自己。

sentences.english: Today, the treadmills are humming again.
sentences.chinese: 如今，跑步机再次转动起来。

sentences.english: So you've run on the treadmill.
The vets then used a treadmill to rebuild his wasted muscles.
sentences.chinese: 于是兽医想到利用跑步机帮其锻炼肌肉。

sentences.english: The exercise including walking, using a treadmill or exercise bike.
sentences.chinese: 所进行的锻炼包括步行，使用跑步机或健身车。

sentences.english: I've seen people at the gym who look like they're holding on to the treadmill's siderails for dear life.
sentences.chinese: 我在健身房看到过有人在跑步机上为了安全抓着扶手。

sentences.english: You can better simulate outdoor running by setting your treadmill at 1% incline.
sentences.chinese: 你可以设定跑步机1%的坡度更好地模拟室外跑。

sentences.english: One of the biggest causes of injuries on treadmills is jumping off a fast-moving treadmill.
sentences.chinese: 最能导致受伤的一个原因是跳下飞速移动中的跑步机。

sentences.english: I'm going to blow you guys off the treadmill today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天要把你们全都轰下跑步机。

sentences.english: Of course, medieval battles did not happen on treadmills.
sentences.chinese: 当然，中世纪的战争不会发生在跑步机上。

sentences.english: Dr Raichlen had them run or walk on the treadmill for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 瑞奇连博士让他们在跑步机上走或跑30分钟。

sentences.english: The chest pain and breathlessness developed suddenly while running on a treadmill.
sentences.chinese: 胸痛和呼吸困难发生于在跑步机上跑步时。

sentences.english: I have found a way to endure a treadmill workout.
sentences.chinese: 我发现了一个熬过跑步机健身的好办法。

sentences.english: Workers on longer sit down , but walk on treadmill while they do their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 人们不再是一直坐着而是边工作边在跑步机上运功。

sentences.english: Use any cardio equipment, such as a treadmill or a cycle.
sentences.chinese: 使用锻炼心肺功能的运动器材，如跑步机或自行车。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
